titles.title: Interstate Ticket Resale Prohibition Act of 1994
To prohibit ticket resale profiteering in or affecting interstate commerce.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 5/4/1994--Introduced. Interstate Ticket Resale Prohibition Act of 1994 - Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit knowingly engaging in the resale of a ticket in or affecting interstate or foreign commerce at a price that exceeds the broker's price for the profit of any individual or entity other than a nonprofit entity.
